name: RETURNING (brokenportals)
description:
This is a short twine game, about loss, grief, memory, love and being lost in a world that stops making sense sometimes.

The game bounces between three different languages, and I apologise if the translations aren't entirely accurate.

There are images in some of the pages, but they may take a second to load.

Hope you enjoy.

Also, this was a song that helped me convey this story while listening to it.
